title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first magical adventure of Harry Potter at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Guest List
author: Lucy Fokley
description: A thrilling whodunit set at a wedding on a remote Irish island.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: An astronaut wakes up on a mission to save humanity, with no memory of how he got there.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic novel of manners, love, and societal expectations in 19th-century England.

title: Red, White & Royal Blue
author: Casey McQuiston
description: The First Son of the United States falls in love with a British prince.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A sweeping history of the human race from the Stone Age to the 21st century.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychotherapist investigates why a famous painter shot her husband and then never spoke another word.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: An epic science fiction novel set in a distant future, dealing with politics, religion, ecology, and human evolution.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: A memoir by former First Lady of the United States Michelle Obama.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A reclusive Hollywood movie icon chooses an unknown magazine reporter to tell her life story.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
author: Anne Frank
description: The personal diary of a young Jewish girl who hid with her family during the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
